fields.description: It includes map layers regarding environmental conditions and land cover, e.g. fire and soil conditions, critical infrastructure, fire propagation forecasts.
It includes map layers regarding weather forecasts with different lead times (short-term, medium-range, and subseasonal)
It includes map layers regarding  forecasts, either in the early warning (e.g. Fire Weather Index, Fire risk) or response phase (Fire spread forecast)
It includes map layers that are relevant in the response phase (fire ongoing)
It includes map layers that are relevant in the response phase (after fire phase)
Deterministic high resolution forecast from ECMWF processed at FMI for several variables.
Ensemble forecast from ECMWF processed at FMI for several variables.
Extended range ensemble forecast from ECMWF processed at FMI for several variables.
It includes map layers regarding weather forecasts with different lead times (short-term, medium-range, and subseasonal)
